name: Impossible 4x4 Monster Track 3
description:
Impossible 4x4 Monster Track 3D is based on realistic and deadly racing tracks of high sky jumper HD flyover construction tracks in which there are endless obstacles and levels to cross.3D addictive and HD real truck demolition in offroad monster truck stunt plane game is for youngsters who want to play daring thrilling adventure games. Get your big wheel transformer truck, to start a stunning furious rush of unpredictable chase of targets.
Amazing sound quality
3d HD graphics
Multiple swift trucks to choose
Easy to learn and drive
Timed levels
Realistic fantasy city ride
jump and hover over the roof tops
